create-form-entry.description: Submit a new entry to a Wufoo form with dynamic field selection.

props.name: format
props.description: Choose the format for the API response. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

find-form.displayName: Find Form by Name or Hash
find-form.description: Get details about a Wufoo form including settings, entry counts, and metadata.

props.name: format
props.description: Choose the format for the API response. JSON is recommended for most integrations.

props.name: includeTodayCount
props.description: Include the number of entries submitted today in the response. Useful for daily analytics and monitoring.

find-submission-by-field.description: Search for form submissions by field value for deduplication and lookup operations.

props.name: format
props.description: Choose the format for the API response. JSON is recommended for most workflows.

props.name: fieldId
props.description: The form field to search in (e.g., Field1 for first name, Field218 for email). You can find Field IDs in the form builder or via the Form Fields API.

props.name: searchValue
props.description: The value to search for in the specified field. For exact matches, use the complete value.

props.name: matchType
props.description: How to match the search value with field data. Choose based on your use case.

props.name: maxResults
props.description: Limit the number of results returned (1-50). Lower numbers are faster for deduplication checks.

props.name: sortOrder
props.description: Order to return results. "Newest First" is best for finding recent duplicates.

props.name: includeMetadata
props.description: Include additional information like submission date, IP address, and creation details.

get-entry-details.description: Get form entries with filtering, sorting, and pagination options.

props.name: format
props.description: Choose the format for the API response. JSON is recommended for most integrations.

props.name: entryId
props.description: Enter a specific Entry ID to retrieve just that entry. Leave blank to get multiple entries with other filters.

props.name: filterField
props.description: The field ID to filter by (e.g., Field1, Field105, EntryId, DateCreated). Leave blank for no filtering.

props.name: filterOperator
props.description: How to compare the filter value with the field data.

props.name: filterValue
props.description: The value to filter by. For dates, use YYYY-MM-DD format or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS for specific times.

props.name: additionalFilterField
props.description: Add a second filter field for more complex queries.

props.name: additionalFilterOperator
props.description: Operator for the second filter.

props.name: additionalFilterValue
props.description: Value for the second filter.

props.name: filterLogic
props.description: How to combine multiple filters. Only applies when using multiple filters.

props.name: sort
props.description: Sort results by field ID (e.g., EntryId, DateCreated, Field1). Leave blank for default order.

props.name: sortDirection
props.description: Order to sort the results.

props.name: pageStart
props.description: Starting entry number for pagination (0 = first entry).

props.name: pageSize
props.description: Number of entries to return (maximum 100 per request).

props.name: includeSystem
props.description: Include additional metadata like IP address, payment status, and completion status.

new_form_entry.description: Triggers when someone submits a new entry to your Wufoo form.

props.name: handshakeKey
props.description: A secret key to validate webhook authenticity and prevent unauthorized requests. Recommended for production workflows.

props.name: includeMetadata
props.description: Include detailed form and field structure information with each submission. Useful for dynamic processing but increases payload size.

props.name: responseFormat
props.description: Choose the format for webhook data. JSON is recommended for most automation workflows.

new_form_created.description: Triggers when a new form is created in your Wufoo account.

props.name: pollingInterval
props.description: How frequently to check for new forms. More frequent checking provides faster detection but uses more API calls.

props.name: nameFilter
props.description: Only trigger for forms containing this text in their name. Leave empty to monitor all forms.

props.name: includeInactive
props.description: Include forms that are not currently active/published. Useful for monitoring all form creation activity.

props.name: responseFormat
props.description: Choose the format for form data. JSON is recommended for most workflows.
